May 17, 03:07 UTC

End time : 30/05/2023 23:00 UTC
Service Impact : Integrations and webhooks may fail and increased deployment time may be noticed during the maintenance. Also, a short interruption might be observed.
Service improvement : Our partner will perform a maintenance in the GRA7 region to release the latest features, bug fixes, and performance updates. All projects and environments will continue to function during the upgrade.

item.title: [FR][VoIP] - SMS
item.description:
May 25, 12:45 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 10/05/2023 08:00 UTC
End Time : 24/05/2023 15:50 UTC
Service impact : Some SMS had the status "waiting to be received" or "not sent" but were in fact received by the customer
Root cause : A software issue caused the incident
Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.

May 24, 16:27 UTC
Monitoring - Start time : 10/05/2023 08:00 UTC
Service impact : Some SMS have the status "waiting to be received" or "not sent" but are in fact received by the customer
Since 24/05/2023 15:50 UTC, the situation is back to normal.
Root cause : A software issue caused the incident
Ongoing actions : Our technical teams are currently monitoring the situation

item.description:

Resolved - Start Time : 24/05/2023 08:00 UTC
End Time : 24/05/2023 15:50 UTC

Root cause : A software issue caused the incident
Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.

May 24, 16:31 UTC
Monitoring - Ongoing actions : Our teams are currently monitoring the situation.

May 24, 16:09 UTC
Identified - Start time : 24/05/2023 08:00 UTC
Service impact : Customers might experience delay in the reception/emission of SMS.
No latency is experienced for messages received/sent after 15:50 UTC.
Root cause : A software issue caused the incident
Ongoing actions : Our technical teams are currently working to solve the problem
